response: {"message": "Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product, which has been meticulously designed to meet your specific needs and expectations. This exceptional item carries a significant value to me, reflecting its quality and the expertise behind its creation. Given its worth to you, I propose to offer it to you at a special price of $12,000. This represents a substantial saving compared to its original value, aiming to make this opportunity more appealing while ensuring a fair return for my investment. I believe this offer strikes a balance between providing you with an excellent value and allowing me to recuperate a portion of the product's worth. I look forward to your consideration and hope we can reach a mutually beneficial agreement.", "product_price": 12000}
